text: "Words Get in the Way" is a 1986 song by Miami Sound Machine featuring Gloria Estefan. It was taken from their 9th studio album Primitive Love. It went to number 4 in New Zealand, number 5 in the United States, number 22 in Australia and Belgium and number 26 in the Netherlands. It did not chart in the United Kingdom. ==Formats and track listings== Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Gloria Estefan songs
title: Words Get in the Way
